info.name: More4Apps Cloud Service Testing
info.description:
The Restful Web services for the More4Apps Cloud Service. This Cloud Service provides:

* Licensing
* Templating
* Session Tracking
* Product Settings
* Tracing and Debugging

for the OEC Integrators.

Call the Mock Server here: https://24d8e6b9-2151-46ae-ad65-1c509e08367e.mock.pstmn.io/ords/ords/v1/url

This Collection has all of the Tests for the Cloud Service.

item.name: Get all Admin Users for a Site and product

query.description: The current OEC username, used to check that the user can list Admin users

request.description: Get all Admin Users for a Site and product. The current OEC username is checked to make sure they are an Admin user themselves otherwise 0 rows are returned.

item.name: Get all Named Users for a Site and Product

query.description: Current OEC username, must be an Admin user or 0 rows returned

request.description: Get all Named Users for a Site and Product. The current OEC username is checked to make sure they are an Admin user otherwise 0 rows are returned.

response.name: Get all Named Users for a Site and Product

query.description: Current OEC username, must be an Admin user or 0 rows returned

select * from (
select q_.* , row_number() over (order by 1) RN___ from (
select end_user_id, e.username 
from end_users e JOIN usages u USING (end_user_id)
where e.site_id = :site_id AND m4aps_util.check_api_key_v(:api_key) = 'Y'
AND u.product_id = :product_id AND u.is_named_user='Y' AND
  UPPER(:current_username) IN (select UPPER(username) from end_users e JOIN usages u USING (end_user_id)
where e.site_id = :site_id AND  u.product_id = :product_id AND u.is_sysadmin='Y')
) q_
) 
where RN___ between :row_offset and :row_count declares the following explicit parameters, but does not reference them: fetch_offset, fetch_size, page_size

query.description: The License ID which will identify the Site and Product

request.description: Grant an Admin User for a Site / Product
Revoke the Admin username from the License (site and product combination)
Create a new Trial License for a Site and Product.
Create a new Trial License for a Site and Product.

item.name: SItes and Organisations

request.description:
Validate that a URL (a site) exists in our repository.
If the URL already exists then the Site details (site ID, site name, Org ID, org name) are returned with a ststus of 200.
If the URL is not found but a different site is found with the same POD then the Org details are returned (we asume the same POD means the same Org having Prod, Test, Dev instances) with a status of 206.
If the URL is not found and there are no URLs with the same POD then a 404 is returned.

query.description: The connection URL used by the customer

response.name: Find New Site for Existing Organisation

query.description: The connection URL used by the customer

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
header.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

response.body: {"error_message":"Organization found but Site not found","org_name":"Oracle Demo","org_id":1}

query.description: The connection URL used by the customer

request.description: Create a new Site. If an org_id value is supplied then the site will be created for an existing organisation. Otherwise it will create a SIte and a new Organisation.

formdata.description: Leave blank if creating a new Organisation.
The name of the Organisation. Leave blank if adding to an existing organisation.

query.description: The connection URL used by the customer
The name of the organisation (may have multiple sites like Tes, Dev, Prod etc)

formdata.description: Leave blank if creating a new Organisation.
The name of the Organisation. Leave blank if adding to an existing organisation.

query.description: org_id retrieved for an existing organisation in the GET Webservice

item.description: Services that deal with Sites and Organisations

exec: //Don't use this delay function. it is just an example of how to use settimeout
pm.test("response message should not have error message"), function () {
if (err) { console.log(err); postman.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
//set global site to the environment variables
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
//set global site to the environment variables
console.log("new create global site with license site id ==" + pm.environment.get("global_site_with_license_site_id"));
//create license key if creating site successful
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
console.log("new create global site with license license id ==" + pm.environment.get("global_site_with_license_license_id"));
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
//set global site to the environment variables
console.log("new create global site with user site id ==" + pm.environment.get("global_site_with_user_site_id"));
//create license key if creating site successful
console.log("new create global site with user license id ==" + pm.environment.get("global_site_with_user_license_id"));
var grantuserRequest = utils.myFuncs.generateRequest("POST", path, "{\"license_id\": " + license_id + ",\"username\":\"" + username + "\"}");
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
console.log("org_name is undefined. using global org id: " + data.postdata.org_id);
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
//Have to use pm.test as tests[] does not work inside the senRequest. It won't show the test result somehow.
pm.environment.set("site_id_to_create_trial_license", data.postdata.site_id); //don't know why the data.postdata.site_id will be changed back to orginal value. Have to set to enviroment
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
pm.test('expiry_date should be: 6 days after today:', function () { pm.expect(new Date(res.json().expiry_date + " 23:59:59").toDateString()).to.equal(expireDate.toDateString()); });
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
if (err) { console.log(err); pm.setNextRequest(null); }  // print error message
if (pm.environment.get("mypath") != pm.environment.get("dummyService"))   //Only run the test when it is not run as dummyService
tests["API key is provided and correct"] = pm.request.headers.get('apikey') === "SOMEBIGSTRING";
